pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, July 10, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, July 10, 2016: 

Oświęcim, Republic of Poland

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Auschwitz-Birkenau State Museum.

Note for media:

  • Open to media for part of the visit and pooled coverage for the remainder


Kyiv, Ukraine

6:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Kyiv, Ukraine.

Kyiv Boryspil International Airport

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


Please note: all times are local.

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
